bug.author: simonzhaoms
bug.summary: [BUG] The link to Recommenders/reco_utils/recommender/sar/sar_singlenode.py is broken in notebooks/02_model/sar_deep_dive.ipynb
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
The link to is not available in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/recommenders/blob/master/notebooks/02_model/sar_deep_dive.ipynb>notebooks/02_model/sar_deep_dive.ipynb</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-h:h3>In which platform does it happen?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the issue?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
It should be ../../reco_utils/recommender/sar/sar_singlenode.py. <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Good catch - maybe create a PR directly to fix the issue
It should be the rendering problem of nbviewer, which is fixed now.
